summary:
Since 2018 working for on identifying and preventing Fraud, starting as an agent, becoming trainer, team leader and currently as a Fraud Manager.

Nine years’ experience performing daily financial duties and providing the sales team with reports, pricing, financial support and strategic projects always providing the best solution for internal clients.

Analytical knowledge developed with roles performed.

Professional goals are connected to battling Online Fraud and Financial business analysis . 
I am interested in constantly developing managerial, strategic reports, leadership skills while keeping track of all trends in the business.
